about_the_game:
Welcome hero!


This is a Demo version of our “Sharded World” game. We publish it so that you can feel the beautiful world of our game, feel its atmosphere and try out the main mechanics.

Here you will face the monsters in a fierce battle!

You will have the opportunity to test your strength on the battlefield with a variety of monsters with unique abilities and appearance, try different types of weapons and equipment, create your own unique combinations in order to defeat the main boss, and cleanse this world from the forces of evil!

  • Main gameplay elements
  • 9 types of weapons and equipment
  • 9 unique Evolutions
  • Battle with the final boss

News and Alerts!

Subscribe to our twitter for news and all sorts of additional content. On twitter we post comics about our universe.

Communication and support!

Come to our discord server. There you can share your achievements, create a support ticket, give advice or suggest your great ideas to our developers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Sharded World Demo is a free version of the survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements. Our team wants you to be able to touch the main elements of the gameplay and feel like a hero who clears the world of monsters, whose main goal is to destroy the main villain of this world!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
